function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evictions and housing displacement leading to increased crowding in residential environments","Impact":"Increased new contact with others and difficulty complying with pandemic health guidelines","Mitigation":"Improved housing stability and access to suitable housing","Technologies":"Housing support programs, affordable housing initiatives","People":"Families facing eviction and housing displacement","Owner":"Government agencies, housing organizations"},{"Description":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","Impact":"Substantial increases in transmission rates of infectious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promotion of larger living spaces, improved shelter conditions","Technologies":"Architectural design for better living spaces, public health campaigns","People":"Individuals living in crowded residential environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission for tuberculosis, influenza, and COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving shelter conditions, providing adequate living space per person","Technologies":"Facility design, housing support programs","People":"Homeless individuals and families, people facing homelessness","Owner":"Homeless shelters, government agencies"}]}
